name: BlueSeven98 ROW: Remastered
description:
BlueSeven was just enjoying his vacation when his rival "Willard" broke into his home and kidnapped his friends. Now, Blue has to go into every world and save his friends from the clutches of Willard!
This is a remaster of the scratch game i made  5 months ago, and it took 3 weeks to make this. I hope you enjoy the very thing i made my life for this time.
